items.content_html: Notiee is a lightweight note-keeping application built using React and Material UI. With Notiee, you can quickly jot down your thoughts, ideas, or important information and easily delete them when they are no longer needed. It's a user-friendly and intuitive way to keep track of your notes.
items.title: koushiksdhu/Notiee: Notiee is a lightweight note-keeping application built using React and Material UI. With Notiee, you can quickly jot down your thoughts, ideas, or important information and easily delete them when they are no longer needed. It's a user-friendly and intuitive way to keep track of your notes.
